name: We Sing: Deutsche Hits
overview: We Sing German hits - these are 40 top songs that make every karaoke party boil! The new part of the successful We Sing series exclusively for Wii offers karaoke fans this time only German-language hits including original video clips. In the varied playlist, full of original songs from rock to pop, from evergreen to chart hit, every karaoke fan, young or old, finds his favorite song quickly. We Sing German hits are available individually or as a bundle with two high-quality microphones. Three different difficulty levels ensure that beginners do not despair and skilled professionals find enough challenge. In addition to the modes for solo artists, there is also a wide selection of'Versus ','Group Battle','Pass The Mic', We Sing', First to X',' Marathon','Blind' and'Expert' To multiplayer modes for long karaoke nights with family and friends. The ability to connect up to four microphones at the same time ensures ultimate multiplayer fun. We Sing German hits - just the thing for those who have always wanted to transform their living room into the hottest karaoke bar of the city!
